name: SYNTHESIA=NOX
description:
:: Controls ::

WASD - movement

Mouse - aim

Spacebar - shoot

LMB - view entity source code

:: HELP ::

- Avoid the hail of enemy bullets as you proceed to confront the source of the corruption plaguing Selene's mind.

- Hack your foes! Click on an enemy to view its source code, and then modify it in the editor on the right-hand side of the screen. Your changes will be directly injected into the enemy and modify their behavior. Javascript is still the language of choice in year 22xx.

:: CREDITS ::

hirudan || Software Developer

cantataku || Music Composer, SFX Designer

Teller Romantique || Title Designer

:: STORY ::

After the events of LUNAR=N0X, a battered ChronoSlip probe delivered the scavenged carcass and consciousness of the synthetic humanoid prognostication entity, the all-driver SELENE, to a secret research station orbiting a moon of Planet 1423. Within its stygian depths, a lone scientist scrambles against time to curb the corruption spreading in the rapidly fragmenting mind of the all-driver so that her wisdom can again guide the Mandate.

Hack the consciousness of an artificial omnipotence. Do not spare the corruption. Selene must survive.
